title: Ire Shaman
text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)Megamorph  (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
